dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1805 IS: Promoting Access to Diabetic Shoes Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Collins (for herself and Mrs. Shaheen) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit nurse practitioners and physician assistants to satisfy the documentation requirement under the Medicare program for coverage of certain shoes for individuals with diabetes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Promoting Access to Diabetic Shoes Act.

section.header: Permitting nurse practitioners and physician assistants to satisfy Medicare documentation requirement for coverage of certain shoes for individuals with diabetes
section.text: Section 1861(s)(12) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395x(s)(12)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting , nurse practitioner, or physician assistant after physician; and
in subparagraph (C), by inserting , nurse practitioner, or physician assistant after each occurrence of physician.
